body.p: The Extensible HyperText Markup Language, or XHTML, is a markup language that has the same depth of expression as HTML, but also conforms to XML syntax.
XHTML document typeassociation rulesA file is considered to be a XHTML document when the root element name is a html.
XHTML document typeschemaThe schema used for these documents is located in ${frameworks}/xhtml/dtd/xhtml1-strict.dtd, where ${frameworks} is a subdirectory of the install directory.
The default CSS options for the XHTML document type are set to merge the CSSs specified in the document with the CSSs defined in the XHTML document type.
XHTML document typeCSSThe CSS file used for rendering XHTML content is located in ${frameworks}/xhtml/css/xhtml.css.
